steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(1), number_in_box(5), put_result_into_box(3)),
Put(number_in_box(8), into_box(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(1), 1), number_in_box(8)), then_go_to_step(6), then_go_to_step(4)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 1), increase(2)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(7), 1), number_in_box(5)), then_go_to_step(7), then_go_to_step(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(2), 1), number_in_box(1)), then_go_to_step(7), then_go_to_step(1)),
Put(number_in_box(5), into_box(3)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 2), increase(1)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 1), increase(1)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 3?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在3号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Multiply: ( number in box 1 ) * ( number in box 5 ), put result into box 3.
Put ( number in box 8 ) into box 1

Change Instruction 1: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 2
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 7 greater than ( number in box 5 )
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 2 greater than ( number in box 1 )
Put ( number in box 5 ) into box 3
Change Instruction 1: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Change Instruction 1: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
